hero.title: Full-Stack Software Engineer

about.title: About Me
about.subtitle: Passionate about creating exceptional digital experiences
about.description: I'm a dedicated full-stack software engineer with {experience} years of experience building scalable web applications and mobile solutions. My passion lies in solving complex problems through clean, efficient code and innovative solutions.

journey.title: My Journey
journey.content: Started as a curious problem-solver, I've evolved into a versatile engineer who thrives on turning ideas into reality. From frontend interfaces to backend architectures, I love the entire development lifecycle.

approach.title: My Approach
approach.content: I believe in writing clean, maintainable code, following best practices, and staying current with emerging technologies. Collaboration and continuous learning are at the core of my development philosophy.

meta.title: Ben H. - Full-Stack Developer | JavaScript, Java, Python Expert
meta.description: Experienced full-stack software engineer specializing in JavaScript, TypeScript, Java, Python, C#, and Swift. Building scalable web applications and mobile solutions.
